text: Garlasco is a comune in the Province of Pavia in the Lombardy region in Italy. It is about southwest of Milan and about west of Pavia. As of 31 December 2004, 9,343 people lived there. It has an area of .All demographics and other statistics: Italian statistical institute Istat. The municipality has only frazione Bozzola. Garlasco is next to these municipalities: Alagna, Borgo San Siro, Dorno, Gropello Cairoli, Tromello, Zerbol√≤. == Demographic change == Colors= id:lightgrey value:gray(0.9) id:darkgrey value:gray(0.8)
